28#include "nbtool_config.h"

31#define DEBUG
32
33#include <ctype.h>
34#include <stdio.h>
35#include <string.h>
36#include <stdlib.h>
37#include <assert.h>
38#include "awk.h"
39#include "awkgram.h"
40
41#define HAT (NCHARS+2) /* matches ^ in regular expr */
42 /* NCHARS is 2**n */
43#define MAXLIN 22
44
45#define type(v) (v)->nobj /* badly overloaded here */
46#define info(v) (v)->ntype /* badly overloaded here */
47#define left(v) (v)->narg[0]
48#define right(v) (v)->narg[1]
49#define parent(v) (v)->nnext
50
51#define LEAF case CCL: case NCCL: case CHAR: case DOT: case FINAL: case ALL:
52#define ELEAF case EMPTYRE: /* empty string in regexp */
53#define UNARY case STAR: case PLUS: case QUEST:
54
55/* encoding in tree Nodes:
56 leaf (CCL, NCCL, CHAR, DOT, FINAL, ALL, EMPTYRE):
57 left is index, right contains value or pointer to value
58 unary (STAR, PLUS, QUEST): left is child, right is null
59 binary (CAT, OR): left and right are children
60 parent contains pointer to parent
61*/
62
63
64int *setvec;
65int *tmpset;
66int maxsetvec = 0;
67
68int rtok; /* next token in current re */
69int rlxval;
70static const uschar *rlxstr;
71static const uschar *prestr; /* current position in current re */
72static const uschar *lastre; /* origin of last re */
73static const uschar *lastatom; /* origin of last Atom */
74static const uschar *starttok;
75static const uschar *basestr; /* starts with original, replaced during
76 repetition processing */
77static const uschar *firstbasestr;
78
79static int setcnt;
80static int poscnt;
81
82uschar *patbeg;
83int patlen;
84
85#define NFA 128 /* cache this many dynamic fa's */
86fa *fatab[NFA];
87int nfatab = 0; /* entries in fatab */
88
89static void
90resizesetvec(const char *msg)
91{
92 if (maxsetvec == 0)
93 maxsetvec = MAXLIN;
94 else
95 maxsetvec *= 4;
96 setvec = realloc(setvec, maxsetvec * sizeof(*setvec));
97 tmpset = realloc(tmpset, maxsetvec * sizeof(*tmpset));
98 if (setvec == 0 || tmpset == 0)
99 overflo(msg);
100}
101
102static void
103resize_state(fa *f, int state)
104{
105 void *p;
106 int i, new_count;
107
108 if (++state < f->state_count)
109 return;
110
111 new_count = state + 10; /* needs to be tuned */
112
113 p = realloc(f->gototab, new_count * sizeof(f->gototab[0]));
114 if (p == NULL)
115 goto out;
116 f->gototab = p;
117
118 p = realloc(f->out, new_count * sizeof(f->out[0]));
119 if (p == NULL)
120 goto out;
121 f->out = p;
122
123 p = realloc(f->posns, new_count * sizeof(f->posns[0]));
124 if (p == NULL)
125 goto out;
126 f->posns = p;
127
128 for (i = f->state_count; i < new_count; ++i) {
129 f->gototab[i] = calloc(1, NCHARS * sizeof (**f->gototab));
130 if (f->gototab[i] == NULL)
131 goto out;
132 f->out[i] = 0;
133 f->posns[i] = NULL;
134 }
135 f->state_count = new_count;
136 return;
137out:
138 overflo("out of memory in resize_state");
139}
140
141fa *makedfa(const char *s, int anchor) /* returns dfa for reg expr s */
142{
143 int i, use, nuse;
144 fa *pfa;
145 static int now = 1;
146
147 if (setvec == 0) /* first time through any RE */
148 resizesetvec("out of space initializing makedfa");
149
150 if (compile_time) /* a constant for sure */
151 return mkdfa(s, anchor);
152 for (i = 0; i < nfatab; i++) /* is it there already? */
153 if (fatab[i]->anchor == anchor
154 && strcmp((const char *) fatab[i]->restr, s) == 0) {
155 fatab[i]->use = now++;
156 return fatab[i];
157 }
158 pfa = mkdfa(s, anchor);
159 if (nfatab < NFA) { /* room for another */
160 fatab[nfatab] = pfa;
161 fatab[nfatab]->use = now++;
162 nfatab++;
163 return pfa;
164 }
165 use = fatab[0]->use; /* replace least-recently used */
166 nuse = 0;
167 for (i = 1; i < nfatab; i++)
168 if (fatab[i]->use < use) {
169 use = fatab[i]->use;
170 nuse = i;
171 }
172 freefa(fatab[nuse]);
173 fatab[nuse] = pfa;
174 pfa->use = now++;
175 return pfa;
176}
177
178fa *mkdfa(const char *s, int anchor) /* does the real work of making a dfa */
179 /* anchor = 1 for anchored matches, else 0 */
180{
181 Node *p, *p1;
182 fa *f;
183
184 firstbasestr = s;
185 basestr = firstbasestr;
186 p = reparse(s);
187 p1 = op2(CAT, op2(STAR, op2(ALL, NIL, NIL), NIL), p);
188 /* put ALL STAR in front of reg. exp. */
189 p1 = op2(CAT, p1, op2(FINAL, NIL, NIL));
190 /* put FINAL after reg. exp. */
191
192 poscnt = 0;
193 penter(p1); /* enter parent pointers and leaf indices */
194 if ((f = calloc(1, sizeof(*f) + poscnt*sizeof(rrow))) == NULL)
195 overflo("out of space for fa");
196 f->accept = poscnt-1; /* penter has computed number of positions in re */
197 cfoll(f, p1); /* set up follow sets */
198 freetr(p1);
199 resize_state(f, 1);
200 if ((f->posns[0] = calloc(1, *(f->re[0].lfollow)*sizeof(int))) == NULL)
201 overflo("out of space in makedfa");
202 if ((f->posns[1] = calloc(1, sizeof(int))) == NULL)
203 overflo("out of space in makedfa");
204 *f->posns[1] = 0;
205 f->initstat = makeinit(f, anchor);
206 f->anchor = anchor;
207 f->restr = (uschar *) tostring(s);
208 if (firstbasestr != basestr) {
209 if (basestr)
210 free(__UNCONST(basestr));
211 }
212 return f;
213}
214
215int makeinit(fa *f, int anchor)
216{
217 int i, k;
218
219 resize_state(f, 2);
220 f->curstat = 2;
221 f->out[2] = 0;
222 k = *(f->re[0].lfollow);
223 xfree(f->posns[2]);
224 if ((f->posns[2] = calloc(1, (k+1)*sizeof(int))) == NULL)
225 overflo("out of space in makeinit");
226 for (i=0; i <= k; i++) {
227 (f->posns[2])[i] = (f->re[0].lfollow)[i];
228 }
229 if ((f->posns[2])[1] == f->accept)
230 f->out[2] = 1;
231 for (i=0; i < NCHARS; i++)
232 f->gototab[2][i] = 0;
233 f->curstat = cgoto(f, 2, HAT);
234 if (anchor) {
235 *f->posns[2] = k-1; /* leave out position 0 */
236 for (i=0; i < k; i++) {
237 (f->posns[0])[i] = (f->posns[2])[i];
238 }
239
240 f->out[0] = f->out[2];
241 if (f->curstat != 2) {
242 resize_state(f, f->curstat);
243 --(*f->posns[f->curstat]);
244 }
245 }
246 return f->curstat;
247}
248
249void penter(Node *p) /* set up parent pointers and leaf indices */
250{
251 switch (type(p)) {
252 ELEAF
253 LEAF
254 info(p) = poscnt;
255 poscnt++;
256 break;
257 UNARY
258 penter(left(p));
259 parent(left(p)) = p;
260 break;
261 case CAT:
262 case OR:
263 penter(left(p));
264 penter(right(p));
265 parent(left(p)) = p;
266 parent(right(p)) = p;
267 break;
268 default: /* can't happen */
269 FATAL("can't happen: unknown type %d in penter", type(p));
270 break;
271 }
272}
273
274void freetr(Node *p) /* free parse tree */
275{
276 switch (type(p)) {
277 ELEAF
278 LEAF
279 xfree(p);
280 break;
281 UNARY
282 freetr(left(p));
283 xfree(p);
284 break;
285 case CAT:
286 case OR:
287 freetr(left(p));
288 freetr(right(p));
289 xfree(p);
290 break;
291 default: /* can't happen */
292 FATAL("can't happen: unknown type %d in freetr", type(p));
293 break;
294 }
295}
296
297/* in the parsing of regular expressions, metacharacters like . have */
298/* to be seen literally; \056 is not a metacharacter. */
299
300int hexstr(const uschar **pp) /* find and eval hex string at pp, return new p */
301{ /* only pick up one 8-bit byte (2 chars) */
302 const uschar *p;
303 int n = 0;
304 int i;
305
306 for (i = 0, p = *pp; i < 2 && isxdigit(*p); i++, p++) {
307 if (isdigit(*p))
308 n = 16 * n + *p - '0';
309 else if (*p >= 'a' && *p <= 'f')
310 n = 16 * n + *p - 'a' + 10;
311 else if (*p >= 'A' && *p <= 'F')
312 n = 16 * n + *p - 'A' + 10;
313 }
314 *pp = p;
315 return n;
316}
317
318#define isoctdigit(c) ((c) >= '0' && (c) <= '7') /* multiple use of arg */
319
320int quoted(const uschar **pp) /* pick up next thing after a \\ */
321 /* and increment *pp */
322{
323 const uschar *p = *pp;
324 int c;
325
326 if ((c = *p++) == 't')
327 c = '\t';
328 else if (c == 'n')
329 c = '\n';
330 else if (c == 'f')
331 c = '\f';
332 else if (c == 'r')
333 c = '\r';
334 else if (c == 'b')
335 c = '\b';
336 else if (c == '\\')
337 c = '\\';
338 else if (c == 'x') { /* hexadecimal goo follows */
339 c = hexstr(&p); /* this adds a null if number is invalid */
340 } else if (isoctdigit(c)) { /* \d \dd \ddd */
341 int n = c - '0';
342 if (isoctdigit(*p)) {
343 n = 8 * n + *p++ - '0';
344 if (isoctdigit(*p))
345 n = 8 * n + *p++ - '0';
346 }
347 c = n;
348 } /* else */
349 /* c = c; */
350 *pp = p;
351 return c;
352}
353
354char *cclenter(const char *argp) /* add a character class */
355{
356 int i, c, c2;
357 const uschar *p = (const uschar *) argp;
358 const uschar *op;
359 uschar *bp;
360 static uschar *buf = 0;
361 static int bufsz = 100;
362
363 op = p;
364 if (buf == 0 && (buf = malloc(bufsz)) == NULL)
365 FATAL("out of space for character class [%.10s...] 1", p);
366 bp = buf;
367 for (i = 0; (c = *p++) != 0; ) {
368 if (c == '\\') {
369 c = quoted(&p);
370 } else if (c == '-' && i > 0 && bp[-1] != 0) {
371 if (*p != 0) {
372 c = bp[-1];
373 c2 = *p++;
374 if (c2 == '\\')
375 c2 = quoted(&p);
376 if (c > c2) { /* empty; ignore */
377 bp--;
378 i--;
379 continue;
380 }
381 while (c < c2) {
382 if (!adjbuf(&buf, &bufsz, bp-buf+2, 100, &bp, "cclenter1"))
383 FATAL("out of space for character class [%.10s...] 2", p);
384 *bp++ = ++c;
385 i++;
386 }
387 continue;
388 }
389 }
390 if (!adjbuf(&buf, &bufsz, bp-buf+2, 100, &bp, "cclenter2"))
391 FATAL("out of space for character class [%.10s...] 3", p);
392 *bp++ = c;
393 i++;
394 }
395 *bp = 0;
396 dprintf( ("cclenter: in = |%s|, out = |%s|\n", op, buf) );
397 free(__UNCONST(op));
398 return (char *) tostring((char *) buf);
399}
400
401void overflo(const char *s)
402{
403 FATAL("regular expression too big: %.30s...", s);
404}
405
406void cfoll(fa *f, Node *v) /* enter follow set of each leaf of vertex v into lfollow[leaf] */
407{
408 int i;
409 int *p;
410
411 switch (type(v)) {
412 ELEAF
413 LEAF
414 f->re[info(v)].ltype = type(v);
415 f->re[info(v)].lval.np = right(v);
416 while (f->accept >= maxsetvec) /* guessing here! */
417 resizesetvec("out of space in cfoll()");
418 for (i = 0; i <= f->accept; i++)
419 setvec[i] = 0;
420 setcnt = 0;
421 follow(v); /* computes setvec and setcnt */
422 if ((p = calloc(1, (setcnt+1)*sizeof(int))) == NULL)
423 overflo("out of space building follow set");
424 f->re[info(v)].lfollow = p;
425 *p = setcnt;
426 for (i = f->accept; i >= 0; i--)
427 if (setvec[i] == 1)
428 *++p = i;
429 break;
430 UNARY
431 cfoll(f,left(v));
432 break;
433 case CAT:
434 case OR:
435 cfoll(f,left(v));
436 cfoll(f,right(v));
437 break;
438 default: /* can't happen */
439 FATAL("can't happen: unknown type %d in cfoll", type(v));
440 }
441}
442
443int first(Node *p) /* collects initially active leaves of p into setvec */
444 /* returns 0 if p matches empty string */
445{
446 int b, lp;
447
448 switch (type(p)) {
449 ELEAF
450 LEAF
451 lp = info(p); /* look for high-water mark of subscripts */
452 while (setcnt >= maxsetvec || lp >= maxsetvec) /* guessing here! */
453 resizesetvec("out of space in first()");
454 if (type(p) == EMPTYRE) {
455 setvec[lp] = 0;
456 return(0);
457 }
458 if (setvec[lp] != 1) {
459 setvec[lp] = 1;
460 setcnt++;
461 }
462 if (type(p) == CCL && (*(char *) right(p)) == '\0')
463 return(0); /* empty CCL */
464 else return(1);
465 case PLUS:
466 if (first(left(p)) == 0) return(0);
467 return(1);
468 case STAR:
469 case QUEST:
470 first(left(p));
471 return(0);
472 case CAT:
473 if (first(left(p)) == 0 && first(right(p)) == 0) return(0);
474 return(1);
475 case OR:
476 b = first(right(p));
477 if (first(left(p)) == 0 || b == 0) return(0);
478 return(1);
479 }
480 FATAL("can't happen: unknown type %d in first", type(p)); /* can't happen */
481 return(-1);
482}
483
484void follow(Node *v) /* collects leaves that can follow v into setvec */
485{
486 Node *p;
487
488 if (type(v) == FINAL)
489 return;
490 p = parent(v);
491 switch (type(p)) {
492 case STAR:
493 case PLUS:
494 first(v);
495 follow(p);
496 return;
497
498 case OR:
499 case QUEST:
500 follow(p);
501 return;
502
503 case CAT:
504 if (v == left(p)) { /* v is left child of p */
505 if (first(right(p)) == 0) {
506 follow(p);
507 return;
508 }
509 } else /* v is right child */
510 follow(p);
511 return;
512 }
513}
514
515int member(int c, const char *sarg) /* is c in s? */
516{
517 const uschar *s = (const uschar *) sarg;
518
519 while (*s)
520 if (c == *s++)
521 return(1);
522 return(0);
523}
524
525int match(fa *f, const char *p0) /* shortest match ? */
526{
527 int s, ns;
528 const uschar *p = (const uschar *) p0;
529
530 s = f->initstat;
531 assert (s < f->state_count);
532
533 if (f->out[s])
534 return(1);
535 do {
536 /* assert(*p < NCHARS); */
537 if ((ns = f->gototab[s][*p]) != 0)
538 s = ns;
539 else
540 s = cgoto(f, s, *p);
541
542 assert (s < f->state_count);
543
544 if (f->out[s])
545 return(1);
546 } while (*p++ != 0);
547 return(0);
548}
549
550int pmatch(fa *f, const char *p0) /* longest match, for sub */
551{
552 int s, ns;
553 uschar *p = __UNCONST(p0);
554 uschar *q;
555
556 s = f->initstat;
557 assert(s < f->state_count);
558 patbeg = p;
559 patlen = -1;
560 do {
561 q = p;
562 do {
563 if (f->out[s]) /* final state */
564 patlen = q-p;
565 /* assert(*q < NCHARS); */
566 if ((ns = f->gototab[s][*q]) != 0)
567 s = ns;
568 else
569 s = cgoto(f, s, *q);
570
571 assert(s < f->state_count);
572
573 if (s == 1) { /* no transition */
574 if (patlen >= 0) {
575 patbeg = p;
576 return(1);
577 }
578 else
579 goto nextin; /* no match */
580 }
581 } while (*q++ != 0);
582 if (f->out[s])
583 patlen = q-p-1; /* don't count $ */
584 if (patlen >= 0) {
585 patbeg = p;
586 return(1);
587 }
588 nextin:
589 s = 2;
590 } while (*p++ != 0);
591 return (0);
592}
593
594int nematch(fa *f, const char *p0) /* non-empty match, for sub */
595{
596 int s, ns;
597 uschar *p = __UNCONST(p0);
598 uschar *q;
599
600 s = f->initstat;
601 assert(s < f->state_count);
602
603 patlen = -1;
604 while (*p) {
605 q = p;
606 do {
607 if (f->out[s]) /* final state */
608 patlen = q-p;
609 /* assert(*q < NCHARS); */
610 if ((ns = f->gototab[s][*q]) != 0)
611 s = ns;
612 else
613 s = cgoto(f, s, *q);
614
615 assert(s < f->state_count);
616
617 if (s == 1) { /* no transition */
618 if (patlen > 0) {
619 patbeg = p;
620 return(1);
621 } else
622 goto nnextin; /* no nonempty match */
623 }
624 } while (*q++ != 0);
625 if (f->out[s])
626 patlen = q-p-1; /* don't count $ */
627 if (patlen > 0 ) {
628 patbeg = p;
629 return(1);
630 }
631 nnextin:
632 s = 2;
633 p++;
634 }
635 return (0);
636}
637
638
639/*
640 * NAME
641 * fnematch
642 *
643 * DESCRIPTION
644 * A stream-fed version of nematch which transfers characters to a
645 * null-terminated buffer. All characters up to and including the last
646 * character of the matching text or EOF are placed in the buffer. If
647 * a match is found, patbeg and patlen are set appropriately.
648 *
649 * RETURN VALUES
650 * 0 No match found.
651 * 1 Match found.
652 */
653
654int fnematch(fa *pfa, FILE *f, uschar **pbuf, int *pbufsize, int quantum)
655{
656 uschar *buf = *pbuf;
657 int bufsize = *pbufsize;
658 int c, i, j, k, ns, s;
659
660 s = pfa->initstat;
661 assert(s < pfa->state_count);
662 patlen = 0;
663
664 /*
665 * All indices relative to buf.
666 * i <= j <= k <= bufsize
667 *
668 * i: origin of active substring
669 * j: current character
670 * k: destination of next getc()
671 */
672 i = -1, k = 0;
673 do {
674 j = i++;
675 do {
676 if (++j == k) {
677 if (k == bufsize)
678 if (!adjbuf(&buf, &bufsize, bufsize+1, quantum, 0, "fnematch"))
679 FATAL("stream '%.30s...' too long", buf);
680 buf[k++] = (c = getc(f)) != EOF ? c : 0;
681 }
682 c = buf[j];
683 /* assert(c < NCHARS); */
684
685 if ((ns = pfa->gototab[s][c]) != 0)
686 s = ns;
687 else
688 s = cgoto(pfa, s, c);
689 assert(s < pfa->state_count);
690
691 if (pfa->out[s]) { /* final state */
692 patlen = j - i + 1;
693 if (c == 0) /* don't count $ */
694 patlen--;
695 }
696 } while (buf[j] && s != 1);
697 s = 2;
698 } while (buf[i] && !patlen);
699
700 /* adjbuf() may have relocated a resized buffer. Inform the world. */
701 *pbuf = buf;
702 *pbufsize = bufsize;
703
704 if (patlen) {
705 patbeg = buf + i;
706 /*
707 * Under no circumstances is the last character fed to
708 * the automaton part of the match. It is EOF's nullbyte,
709 * or it sent the automaton into a state with no further
710 * transitions available (s==1), or both. Room for a
711 * terminating nullbyte is guaranteed.
712 *
713 * ungetc any chars after the end of matching text
714 * (except for EOF's nullbyte, if present) and null
715 * terminate the buffer.
716 */
717 do
718 if (buf[--k] && ungetc(buf[k], f) == EOF)
719 FATAL("unable to ungetc '%c'", buf[k]);
720 while (k > i + patlen);
721 buf[k] = 0;
722 return 1;
723 }
724 else
725 return 0;
726}
727
728Node *reparse(const char *p) /* parses regular expression pointed to by p */
729{ /* uses relex() to scan regular expression */
730 Node *np;
731
732 dprintf( ("reparse <%s>\n", p) );
733 lastre = prestr = (const uschar *) p; /* prestr points to string to be parsed */
734 rtok = relex();
735 /* GNU compatibility: an empty regexp matches anything */
736 if (rtok == '\0') {
737 /* FATAL("empty regular expression"); previous */
738 return(op2(EMPTYRE, NIL, NIL));
739 }
740 np = regexp();
741 if (rtok != '\0')
742 FATAL("syntax error in regular expression %s at %s", lastre, prestr);
743 return(np);
744}
745
746Node *regexp(void) /* top-level parse of reg expr */
747{
748 return (alt(concat(primary())));
749}
750
751Node *primary(void)
752{
753 Node *np;
754 int savelastatom;
755
756 switch (rtok) {
757 case CHAR:
758 lastatom = starttok;
759 np = op2(CHAR, NIL, itonp(rlxval));
760 rtok = relex();
761 return (unary(np));
762 case ALL:
763 rtok = relex();
764 return (unary(op2(ALL, NIL, NIL)));
765 case EMPTYRE:
766 rtok = relex();
767 return (unary(op2(EMPTYRE, NIL, NIL)));
768 case DOT:
769 lastatom = starttok;
770 rtok = relex();
771 return (unary(op2(DOT, NIL, NIL)));
772 case CCL:
773 np = op2(CCL, NIL, (Node*) cclenter((const char *) rlxstr));
774 lastatom = starttok;
775 rtok = relex();
776 return (unary(np));
777 case NCCL:
778 np = op2(NCCL, NIL, (Node *) cclenter((const char *) rlxstr));
779 lastatom = starttok;
780 rtok = relex();
781 return (unary(np));
782 case '^':
783 rtok = relex();
784 return (unary(op2(CHAR, NIL, itonp(HAT))));
785 case '$':
786 rtok = relex();
787 return (unary(op2(CHAR, NIL, NIL)));
788 case '(':
789 lastatom = starttok;
790 savelastatom = starttok - basestr; /* Retain over recursion */
791 rtok = relex();
792 if (rtok == ')') { /* special pleading for () */
793 rtok = relex();
794 return unary(op2(CCL, NIL, (Node *) tostring("")));
795 }
796 np = regexp();
797 if (rtok == ')') {
798 lastatom = basestr + savelastatom; /* Restore */
799 rtok = relex();
800 return (unary(np));
801 }
802 else
803 FATAL("syntax error in regular expression %s at %s", lastre, prestr);
804 default:
805 FATAL("illegal primary in regular expression %s at %s", lastre, prestr);
806 }
807 return 0; /*NOTREACHED*/
808}
809
810Node *concat(Node *np)
811{
812 switch (rtok) {
813 case CHAR: case DOT: case ALL: case CCL: case NCCL: case '$': case '(':
814 return (concat(op2(CAT, np, primary())));
815 case EMPTYRE:
816 rtok = relex();
817 return (concat(op2(CAT, op2(CCL, NIL, (Node *) tostring("")),
818 primary())));
819 }
820 return (np);
821}
822
823Node *alt(Node *np)
824{
825 if (rtok == OR) {
826 rtok = relex();
827 return (alt(op2(OR, np, concat(primary()))));
828 }
829 return (np);
830}
831
832Node *unary(Node *np)
833{
834 switch (rtok) {
835 case STAR:
836 rtok = relex();
837 return (unary(op2(STAR, np, NIL)));
838 case PLUS:
839 rtok = relex();
840 return (unary(op2(PLUS, np, NIL)));
841 case QUEST:
842 rtok = relex();
843 return (unary(op2(QUEST, np, NIL)));
844 default:
845 return (np);
846 }
847}
848
849/*
850 * Character class definitions conformant to the POSIX locale as
851 * defined in IEEE P1003.1 draft 7 of June 2001, assuming the source
852 * and operating character sets are both ASCII (ISO646) or supersets
853 * thereof.
854 *
855 * Note that to avoid overflowing the temporary buffer used in
856 * relex(), the expanded character class (prior to range expansion)
857 * must be less than twice the size of their full name.
858 */
859
860/* Because isblank doesn't show up in any of the header files on any
861 * system i use, it's defined here. if some other locale has a richer
862 * definition of "blank", define HAS_ISBLANK and provide your own
863 * version.
864 * the parentheses here are an attempt to find a path through the maze
865 * of macro definition and/or function and/or version provided. thanks
866 * to nelson beebe for the suggestion; let's see if it works everywhere.
867 */
868
869/* #define HAS_ISBLANK */
870
871static const struct charclass {
872 const char *cc_name;
873 int cc_namelen;
874 int (*cc_func)(int);
875} charclasses[] = {
876 { "alnum", 5, isalnum },
877 { "alpha", 5, isalpha },
878#ifndef HAS_ISBLANK
879 { "blank", 5, isspace }, /* was isblank */
880#else
881 { "blank", 5, isblank },
882#endif
883 { "cntrl", 5, iscntrl },
884 { "digit", 5, isdigit },
885 { "graph", 5, isgraph },
886 { "lower", 5, islower },
887 { "print", 5, isprint },
888 { "punct", 5, ispunct },
889 { "space", 5, isspace },
890 { "upper", 5, isupper },
891 { "xdigit", 6, isxdigit },
892 { NULL, 0, NULL },
893};
894
895#define REPEAT_SIMPLE 0
896#define REPEAT_PLUS_APPENDED 1
897#define REPEAT_WITH_Q 2
898#define REPEAT_ZERO 3
899
900static int
901replace_repeat(const uschar *reptok, int reptoklen, const uschar *atom,
902 int atomlen, int firstnum, int secondnum, int special_case)
903{
904 int i, j;
905 uschar *buf = 0;
906 int ret = 1;
907 int init_q = (firstnum==0); /* first added char will be ? */
908 int n_q_reps = secondnum-firstnum; /* m>n, so reduce until {1,m-n} left */
909 int prefix_length = reptok - basestr; /* prefix includes first rep */
910 int suffix_length = strlen(reptok) - reptoklen; /* string after rep specifier */
911 int size = prefix_length + suffix_length;
912
913 if (firstnum > 1) { /* add room for reps 2 through firstnum */
914 size += atomlen*(firstnum-1);
915 }
916
917 /* Adjust size of buffer for special cases */
918 if (special_case == REPEAT_PLUS_APPENDED) {
919 size++; /* for the final + */
920 } else if (special_case == REPEAT_WITH_Q) {
921 size += init_q + (atomlen+1)* n_q_reps;
922 } else if (special_case == REPEAT_ZERO) {
923 size += 2; /* just a null ERE: () */
924 }
925 if ((buf = (uschar *) malloc(size+1)) == NULL)
926 FATAL("out of space in reg expr %.10s..", lastre);
927 memcpy(buf, basestr, prefix_length); /* copy prefix */
928 j = prefix_length;
929 if (special_case == REPEAT_ZERO) {
930 j -= atomlen;
931 buf[j++] = '(';
932 buf[j++] = ')';
933 }
934 for (i=1; i < firstnum; i++) { /* copy x reps */
935 memcpy(&buf[j], atom, atomlen);
936 j += atomlen;
937 }
938 if (special_case == REPEAT_PLUS_APPENDED) {
939 buf[j++] = '+';
940 } else if (special_case == REPEAT_WITH_Q) {
941 if (init_q) buf[j++] = '?';
942 for (i=0; i < n_q_reps; i++) { /* copy x? reps */
943 memcpy(&buf[j], atom, atomlen);
944 j += atomlen;
945 buf[j++] = '?';
946 }
947 }
948 memcpy(&buf[j], reptok+reptoklen, suffix_length);
949 if (special_case == REPEAT_ZERO) {
950 buf[j+suffix_length] = '\0';
951 } else {
952 buf[size] = '\0';
953 }
954 /* free old basestr */
955 if (firstbasestr != basestr) {
956 if (basestr)
957 free(__UNCONST(basestr));
958 }
959 basestr = (char *)buf;
960 prestr = buf + prefix_length;
961 if (special_case == REPEAT_ZERO) {
962 prestr -= atomlen;
963 ret++;
964 }
965 return ret;
966}
967
968static int repeat(const uschar *reptok, int reptoklen, const uschar *atom,
969 int atomlen, int firstnum, int secondnum)
970{
971 /*
972 In general, the repetition specifier or "bound" is replaced here
973 by an equivalent ERE string, repeating the immediately previous atom
974 and appending ? and + as needed. Note that the first copy of the
975 atom is left in place, except in the special_case of a zero-repeat
976 (i.e., {0}).
977 */
978 if (secondnum < 0) { /* means {n,} -> repeat n-1 times followed by PLUS */
979 if (firstnum < 2) {
980 /* 0 or 1: should be handled before you get here */
981 } else {
982 return replace_repeat(reptok, reptoklen, atom, atomlen,
983 firstnum, secondnum, REPEAT_PLUS_APPENDED);
984 }
985 } else if (firstnum == secondnum) { /* {n} or {n,n} -> simply repeat n-1 times */
986 if (firstnum == 0) { /* {0} or {0,0} */
987 /* This case is unusual because the resulting
988 replacement string might actually be SMALLER than
989 the original ERE */
990 return replace_repeat(reptok, reptoklen, atom, atomlen,
991 firstnum, secondnum, REPEAT_ZERO);
992 } else { /* (firstnum >= 1) */
993 return replace_repeat(reptok, reptoklen, atom, atomlen,
994 firstnum, secondnum, REPEAT_SIMPLE);
995 }
996 } else if (firstnum < secondnum) { /* {n,m} -> repeat n-1 times then alternate */
997 /* x{n,m} => xx...x{1, m-n+1} => xx...x?x?x?..x? */
998 return replace_repeat(reptok, reptoklen, atom, atomlen,
999 firstnum, secondnum, REPEAT_WITH_Q);
1000 } else { /* Error - shouldn't be here (n>m) */
1001 }
1002 return 0;
1003}
1004
1005int relex(void) /* lexical analyzer for reparse */
1006{
1007 int c, n;
1008 int cflag;
1009 static uschar *buf = 0;
1010 static int bufsz = 100;
1011 uschar *bp;
1012 const struct charclass *cc;
1013 int i;
1014 int num, m, commafound, digitfound;
1015 const uschar *startreptok;
1016
1017rescan:
1018 starttok = prestr;
1019
1020 switch (c = *prestr++) {
1021 case '|': return OR;
1022 case '*': return STAR;
1023 case '+': return PLUS;
1024 case '?': return QUEST;
1025 case '.': return DOT;
1026 case '\0': prestr--; return '\0';
1027 case '^':
1028 case '$':
1029 case '(':
1030 case ')':
1031 return c;
1032 case '\\':
1033 rlxval = quoted(&prestr);
1034 return CHAR;
1035 default:
1036 rlxval = c;
1037 return CHAR;
1038 case '[':
1039 if (buf == 0 && (buf = malloc(bufsz)) == NULL)
1040 FATAL("out of space in reg expr %.10s..", lastre);
1041 bp = buf;
1042 if (*prestr == '^') {
1043 cflag = 1;
1044 prestr++;
1045 }
1046 else
1047 cflag = 0;
1048 n = 2 * strlen((const char *) prestr)+1;
1049 if (!adjbuf(&buf, &bufsz, n, n, &bp, "relex1"))
1050 FATAL("out of space for reg expr %.10s...", lastre);
1051 for (; ; ) {
1052 if ((c = *prestr++) == '\\') {
1053 *bp++ = '\\';
1054 if ((c = *prestr++) == '\0')
1055 FATAL("nonterminated character class %.20s...", lastre);
1056 *bp++ = c;
1057 /* } else if (c == '\n') { */
1058 /* FATAL("newline in character class %.20s...", lastre); */
1059 } else if (c == '[' && *prestr == ':') {
1060 /* POSIX char class names, Dag-Erling Smorgrav, des@ofug.org */
1061 for (cc = charclasses; cc->cc_name; cc++)
1062 if (strncmp((const char *) prestr + 1, (const char *) cc->cc_name, cc->cc_namelen) == 0)
1063 break;
1064 if (cc->cc_name != NULL && prestr[1 + cc->cc_namelen] == ':' &&
1065 prestr[2 + cc->cc_namelen] == ']') {
1066 prestr += cc->cc_namelen + 3;
1067 for (i = 1; i < NCHARS; i++) {
1068 if (!adjbuf(&buf, &bufsz, bp-buf+1, 100, &bp, "relex2"))
1069 FATAL("out of space for reg expr %.10s...", lastre);
1070 if (cc->cc_func(i)) {
1071 *bp++ = i;
1072 n++;
1073 }
1074 }
1075 } else
1076 *bp++ = c;
1077 } else if (c == '[' && *prestr == '.') {
1078 char collate_char;
1079 prestr++;
1080 collate_char = *prestr++;
1081 if (*prestr == '.' && prestr[1] == ']') {
1082 prestr += 2;
1083 /* Found it: map via locale TBD: for
1084 now, simply return this char. This
1085 is sufficient to pass conformance
1086 test awk.ex 156
1087 */
1088 if (*prestr == ']') {
1089 prestr++;
1090 rlxval = collate_char;
1091 return CHAR;
1092 }
1093 }
1094 } else if (c == '[' && *prestr == '=') {
1095 char equiv_char;
1096 prestr++;
1097 equiv_char = *prestr++;
1098 if (*prestr == '=' && prestr[1] == ']') {
1099 prestr += 2;
1100 /* Found it: map via locale TBD: for now
1101 simply return this char. This is
1102 sufficient to pass conformance test
1103 awk.ex 156
1104 */
1105 if (*prestr == ']') {
1106 prestr++;
1107 rlxval = equiv_char;
1108 return CHAR;
1109 }
1110 }
1111 } else if (c == '\0') {
1112 FATAL("nonterminated character class %.20s", lastre);
1113 } else if (bp == buf) { /* 1st char is special */
1114 *bp++ = c;
1115 } else if (c == ']') {
1116 *bp++ = 0;
1117 rlxstr = (uschar *) tostring((char *) buf);
1118 if (cflag == 0)
1119 return CCL;
1120 else
1121 return NCCL;
1122 } else
1123 *bp++ = c;
1124 }
1125 break;
1126 case '{':
1127 if (isdigit(*(prestr))) {
1128 num = 0; /* Process as a repetition */
1129 n = -1; m = -1;
1130 commafound = 0;
1131 digitfound = 0;
1132 startreptok = prestr-1;
1133 /* Remember start of previous atom here ? */
1134 } else { /* just a { char, not a repetition */
1135 rlxval = c;
1136 return CHAR;
1137 }
1138 for (; ; ) {
1139 if ((c = *prestr++) == '}') {
1140 if (commafound) {
1141 if (digitfound) { /* {n,m} */
1142 m = num;
1143 if (m<n)
1144 FATAL("illegal repetition expression: class %.20s",
1145 lastre);
1146 if ((n==0) && (m==1)) {
1147 return QUEST;
1148 }
1149 } else { /* {n,} */
1150 if (n==0) return STAR;
1151 if (n==1) return PLUS;
1152 }
1153 } else {
1154 if (digitfound) { /* {n} same as {n,n} */
1155 n = num;
1156 m = num;
1157 } else { /* {} */
1158 FATAL("illegal repetition expression: class %.20s",
1159 lastre);
1160 }
1161 }
1162 if (repeat(starttok, prestr-starttok, lastatom,
1163 startreptok - lastatom, n, m) > 0) {
1164 if ((n==0) && (m==0)) {
1165 return EMPTYRE;
1166 }
1167 /* must rescan input for next token */
1168 goto rescan;
1169 }
1170 /* Failed to replace: eat up {...} characters
1171 and treat like just PLUS */
1172 return PLUS;
1173 } else if (c == '\0') {
1174 FATAL("nonterminated character class %.20s",
1175 lastre);
1176 } else if (isdigit(c)) {
1177 num = 10 * num + c - '0';
1178 digitfound = 1;
1179 } else if (c == ',') {
1180 if (commafound)
1181 FATAL("illegal repetition expression: class %.20s",
1182 lastre);
1183 /* looking for {n,} or {n,m} */
1184 commafound = 1;
1185 n = num;
1186 digitfound = 0; /* reset */
1187 num = 0;
1188 } else {
1189 FATAL("illegal repetition expression: class %.20s",
1190 lastre);
1191 }
1192 }
1193 break;
1194 }
1195}
1196
1197int cgoto(fa *f, int s, int c)
1198{
1199 int i, j, k;
1200 int *p, *q;
1201
1202 assert(c == HAT || c < NCHARS);
1203 while (f->accept >= maxsetvec) /* guessing here! */
1204 resizesetvec("out of space in cgoto()");
1205 for (i = 0; i <= f->accept; i++)
1206 setvec[i] = 0;
1207 setcnt = 0;
1208 resize_state(f, s);
1209 /* compute positions of gototab[s,c] into setvec */
1210 p = f->posns[s];
1211 for (i = 1; i <= *p; i++) {
1212 if ((k = f->re[p[i]].ltype) != FINAL) {
1213 if ((k == CHAR && c == ptoi(f->re[p[i]].lval.np))
1214 || (k == DOT && c != 0 && c != HAT)
1215 || (k == ALL && c != 0)
1216 || (k == EMPTYRE && c != 0)
1217 || (k == CCL && member(c, (char *) f->re[p[i]].lval.up))
1218 || (k == NCCL && !member(c, (char *) f->re[p[i]].lval.up) && c != 0 && c != HAT)) {
1219 q = f->re[p[i]].lfollow;
1220 for (j = 1; j <= *q; j++) {
1221 if (q[j] >= maxsetvec)
1222 resizesetvec("cgoto overflow");
1223 if (setvec[q[j]] == 0) {
1224 setcnt++;
1225 setvec[q[j]] = 1;
1226 }
1227 }
1228 }
1229 }
1230 }
1231 /* determine if setvec is a previous state */
1232 tmpset[0] = setcnt;
1233 j = 1;
1234 for (i = f->accept; i >= 0; i--)
1235 if (setvec[i]) {
1236 tmpset[j++] = i;
1237 }
1238
1239 resize_state(f, f->curstat > s ? f->curstat : s);
1240 /* tmpset == previous state? */
1241 for (i = 1; i <= f->curstat; i++) {
1242 p = f->posns[i];
1243 if ((k = tmpset[0]) != p[0])
1244 goto different;
1245 for (j = 1; j <= k; j++)
1246 if (tmpset[j] != p[j])
1247 goto different;
1248 /* setvec is state i */
1249 if (c != HAT)
1250 f->gototab[s][c] = i;
1251 return i;
1252 different:;
1253 }
1254
1255 /* add tmpset to current set of states */
1256 ++(f->curstat);
1257 resize_state(f, f->curstat);
1258 for (i = 0; i < NCHARS; i++)
1259 f->gototab[f->curstat][i] = 0;
1260 xfree(f->posns[f->curstat]);
1261 if ((p = calloc(1, (setcnt+1)*sizeof(int))) == NULL)
1262 overflo("out of space in cgoto");
1263
1264 f->posns[f->curstat] = p;
1265 if (c != HAT)
1266 f->gototab[s][c] = f->curstat;
1267 for (i = 0; i <= setcnt; i++)
1268 p[i] = tmpset[i];
1269 if (setvec[f->accept])
1270 f->out[f->curstat] = 1;
1271 else
1272 f->out[f->curstat] = 0;
1273 return f->curstat;
1274}
1275
1276
1277void freefa(fa *f) /* free a finite automaton */
1278{
1279 int i;
1280
1281 if (f == NULL)
1282 return;
1283 for (i = 0; i < f->state_count; i++) {
1284 xfree(f->gototab[i])
1285 xfree(f->posns[i]);
1286 }
1287 for (i = 0; i <= f->accept; i++) {
1288 xfree(f->re[i].lfollow);
1289 if (f->re[i].ltype == CCL || f->re[i].ltype == NCCL)
1290 xfree((f->re[i].lval.np));
1291 }
1292 xfree(f->restr);
1293 xfree(f->out);
1294 xfree(f->posns);
1295 xfree(f->gototab);
1296 xfree(f);
1297}
